attributes.action: A Countrywide Law to prevent Residential bonfires before 6pm
attributes.additional_details: Having continually to wash , & tumble dry my washing at our expence because other people always having bonfires during the day . when they could bonfire after 6pm , when most people would have retrieved their washing from the line . & young children are less likely to be playing out .
attributes.background: To stop ignorant people continually having bonfires during the day , without consideration for people who hang out their washing . & to protect children playing in their gardens from the effect of smoke.
